website_summaries.verdict: 4 bright lights help illuminate this 3-door medicine cabinet that comes at a decent price.
pros: Can install in a wall recess
30-inches by 30-inches in size, but also comes in larger sizes
Arrives quickly and in good condition
cons: While there are 3 mirrors here, they do not hinge open in a way that would allow you to see the back of your head

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 1. This is not triview mirror as all 3 mirrors open on the same side. But it became clear only after the cabinet was on the wall. 2. The mirrors are very fragile , and to open a door you have to press the mirror itself so you leave a mark on it - very annoying. 3. The room inside is very small. It's literally a "medicine" cabinet because even a bottle of shampoo or conditioner doesn't fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Maiden

customer_reviews.title: That this cabinet fit pre-existing dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a veery old medicine cabinet in a fairly old house with the least amount of fuss and this cabinet fit the bill quite nicely. It was a bit more difficult to install than I had expected, but it came out fine. The storage capacity is also fine for my needs. I suspect that new homes and younger homeowners may want something a bit different, but I am completely happy with my choice and definitely would recommend. My recommendation missed five stars because it of the little bit more difficult installation.
customer_reviews.author: IIMCGK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, no flaws. Very good instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the item seems very well made and was pretty easy to install if you take the time to read the instructions. I installed it by myself using the ample packaging material to hold up the cabinet while I fastened it to the bathroom wall. The wall did not have an electrical box so instead I wired it to a corded plug and then plugged it into a switched outlet right under the cabinet. The doors and lights worked flawlessly, there are no blemishes. There seems to be ample room inside the cabinet for everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Martyk

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet is great
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our bath room was not real sure when I ordered this but love it-easy to put together and looks great, shelves don't adjust but they are the right size anyway picture so you can see the shelves
customer_reviews.author: weezie

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Medicine Cabinet . . . but . . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive and sturdy medicine cabinet (once the installation is complete!!) Unfortunately, the directions are horrible and we hit a major "snag" after cabinet was installed on bathroom wall. My medicine cabinet has 4 sockets for 4 bulbs, but hardware and wiring were totally missing in socket #2. This let's you know that "quality control" at the factory was non-existent or very, very poor! Instead of returning, we had to make a trip to Lowe's and purchase replacement socket and wiring kit (without electrical background this would have been a big nightmare).
customer_reviews.author: The Farmer's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice vanity.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vanity and through Amazon you get it delivered quickly. When compared to HD the price was lower and I did not need to travel to a big box store. This product was easy to install and comes almost completed assembled except for the mirrored panels.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Reiswig

customer_reviews.title: Great Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Medicine Cabinet. It gives very good lighting. The shelves are a little narrower than expected but adequate. It was easy to install, it took about 2 hours for a non professional. The price was much better than most I looked at in home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I found two seeming errors in the instructions, but assembly was straightforward. The cabinet (I got the 30") is big and spacious. I put in four LED bulbs and it's plenty bright. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This item is very nice and does what it's supposed to do. The only thing is that your gonna have to be good with your hands and mind to get it hanged on the wall. The glass doors are easy to install but you have to be careful not to tighten them to tight. It comes with instructions so once you follow them you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Arlington Lake

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and quality. However, there is no kind of plate over the mirror where you can push onto the mirror/door in order to open it. Otherwise, I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rittenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good value for now...
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, no damage, easy installation if you are handy. The color is not a true white or white white, has a grayish tint to it or dirty white. It is covered particul board, hope it will hold up in a high humid environment, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet. Excellent customer service. Packaging of the cabinet by the manufacturer is outstanding. There is now way this cabinet could be damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks so amazing in our bathroom - love it!! - great storage.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: exceptional hair styling now capable
customer_reviews.text: best way to see all sides of fashioned hair style
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my medicine cabinet very much. I like the fact that the lights are attached to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine e.

customer_reviews.title: I never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet. Always worried about freight damage but all was good! Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: David sweet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is beautiful and looks great on the wall. The only thing I don't like about it is (and I knew this before I purchased it) the not adjustable shelves. The shelves are equidistant from each other so there is no way to store tall items. Other than that, I love it. It has a classy look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple for contractor. Very pleased with cabinet, lights, and mirrored doors. Only wish depth was greater as more storage space would be better.
customer_reviews.author: sharmead

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for the cost. Cheaply made. Latch was broken. Screws that come with the unit to mount onto the wall, were small.We used heavy duty ones that were on the previous cabinet. Didn't want to spend loads of money, so it was adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Ric pontes

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this product except for the fact that the shelves are not adjustable. Other than that it is well built and is functioning nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Freryder

customer_reviews.title: we got spoiled with our old lighting that was so bad we couldn't see ourselves anymore hahahahahahahaha
customer_reviews.text: wow, got this installed after the lights gradually went out in an old vanity we had. Sure brightens up the bathroom but WOW now we know how old we look lol....we got spoiled with our old lighting that was so bad we couldn't see ourselves anymore hahahahahahahaha..seriously, nice vanity, lots of room in it. ONLY thing I would change (and there are easy fixes for this, like a decal on the corner of each door, or glass etching a design with etching cream you can buy at any hobby shop), you have to touch the corner of the door to open it, so there are always smudges on the mirrors in the bottom corners....
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but i had to get a dimmer switch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great , but i had to get a dimmer switch ,for the lights ,Holds allot of supplies .be careful ,the mirror behind the bulbs can break easy.And the doors are glass mirrors ,period .Have to put the hinges on them yourself .A 2 person job ,hanging it .nailed a board to the wall where the bottom sits ,to brace it while i wired it .And the other person held it leaning forward.
customer_reviews.author: PaulS

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was easy to install. The only issues was one of the door closers didn't work right but the company sent another one right off. The shelves are not adjustable so taller items didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. Fits my bathroom perfectly. Really looks nice. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item came in intact on time it was exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet isn't made as well as I had hoped, it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and added a touch of class to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My tenant loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my rental apartment and my tenant loves it. You need to be handy to put it together it comes in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can't put upright shaving cream, electric toothbrush....disappointed. Cannot adjust height and width is smaller also. However, assembly was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bash

customer_reviews.title: Lighted mirror
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for, fit the space,was easy to install. would recomend fo future customers. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The shelves don't adjust so many of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The shelves don't adjust so many of the taller standard things like shave cream, combs, and bottles of medicines and lotions can't fit because of unadjustable shelves. I would have spent more for adjustable shelves. You get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.author: del

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit so I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jensen 755371 Granville Triview Surface Mount Medicine Cabinet 30" x 30" White
product_meta.description:
Granville is a sturdy, wood body cabinet constructed of particle board, assembled via dowel and glue technique, and is covered with a water resistant PVC laminate. The framed cabinet features a solid wood decorative frame coated with white paint to refresh the look of your bathroom. Satin Nickel socket cups hold incandescent lights for a bright bath or powder room. This classic will always work, no matter how many times you change accent colors. Three 60-watt incandescent lights (bulbs not included) ensure a well-lit environment for an enjoyable experience. Surface mount design provides an unlimited number of places to install the cabinet exactly where you want it. White finished solid wood frame surrounds a tri-view polished mirror that ensures a distortion-free reflection to last a lifetime. Two fixed wood shelves allow you to store necessities, so all the items you want to keep handy are always within reach. Housing body is panel style (no face-frame) and particle board construction with PVC laminate, providing a "furniture" type appearance. Left hand and center doors open together, right hand door opens with a right hand swing providing multiple access to necessities or a way to divide up space for "his & hers", Granville has the space to suit your needs. Pivot hinges provide a firm grip to hold the mirrors in place so you can adjust the view just as you need it. Overall size is 30 by 30 by 4-3/4-inch.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Achieve both attractiveness and functionality with this NuTone 30-Inch 3-Door Medicine Cabinet in Classic White with 4 Lights. The 3-Door design maximizes storage space and provides convenient access to products while still having full use of a mirror. The shelves accommodate a variety of container shapes and sizes for versatile storage options. Dedicated to new product development, superior quality, and world class delivery, Broan-NuTone Storage Solutions is the preferred choice for your medicine cabinet and storage requirements.
feature_bullets: Three 60-watt incandescent lights (bulbs not included) ensure a well-lit environment for an enjoyable experience
Surface mount design provides an unlimited number of places to install the cabinet exactly where you want it
Doors open together or separately allowing easy access from either side
